```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
if (!require(pacman)) install.packages("pacman"); require(pacman)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, lubridate, feather, DataExplorer)
source("./src/setup.R")

# Add the names of all tables in [Warehouse].[dbo] that need to be pulled
# Add them as a quoted string or vector of strings.
# Capitalization IS important!
tables <- c("DIBI_Permits", "AAR_Annual")

load_tables(tables)
for (i in tables) {
    DataExplorer::create_report(get(i),
        output_file = paste0(i, ".html"), 
        output_dir = "./reports/",
        output_format = "html_document",
        config = config)
}
```
